TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AcknowledgeTypes extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Message Queuing 傳回給傳送應用程式的通知訊息型別。

span.span: Specifies the types of acknowledgment message that Message Queuing returns to the sending application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組旗標，您可以組合要求的通知訊息的一或多個類別。The class provides a set of flags that you can combine to request one or more categories of acknowledgment messages. 當應用程式傳送訊息時，它可以要求訊息佇列傳回指出成功或失敗，原始訊息的認可訊息。When an application sends a message, it can request that Message Queuing return acknowledgment messages indicating the success or failure of the original message. 訊息佇列會傳送這些通知訊息給您指定的管理佇列。Message Queuing sends these acknowledgment messages to the administration queue you specify. 通知類型可以大致可分為四個群組： 正抵達通知、 正讀取的通知、 負抵達通知和負讀取的通知。Acknowledgment types can be divided broadly into four groups: positive arrival acknowledgments, positive read acknowledgments, negative arrival acknowledgments, and negative read acknowledgments. 要求通知可讓您的應用程式接收通知的特定項目 — 比方說，訊息到達目的地佇列、 已擷取訊息或防止訊息到達，或從擷取逾時目的地佇列。Requesting acknowledgments enables your application to receive notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue. 當您使用類別將訊息傳送至佇列，您會指定您的應用程式應該會在收到的通知類型屬性，以及接收通知訊息中的管理佇列屬性。When you are using the class to send messages to a queue, you specify the types of acknowledgments your application should receive in the property, as well as the administration queue that receives the acknowledgment messages in the property. 當您使用類別，以讀取認可訊息在系統管理佇列中，執行個體的屬性表示的條件負責通知訊息，例如，如果逾時過期之前原始訊息已從佇列讀取。When you use the class to read acknowledgment messages in the administration queue, the instance's property indicates the condition responsible for the acknowledgment message, for example, if a time-out expired before the original message was read from the queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將傳送和接收包含訂單與佇列的訊息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正值通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes FullReachQueue = int32(5)

summary.span: 如果原始訊息到達佇列，則為用來要求正通知的遮罩，如果到達佇列所需時間計時器到期或無法驗證原始訊息，則為用來要求負通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message reaches the queue or negative acknowledgment if the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if the original message cannot be authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes FullReceive = int32(14)

summary.span: 如果在到達佇列所需時間計時器到期之前接收到原始訊息，則為用來要求正通知的遮罩，否則為用來要求負通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message is received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires or negative acknowledgment otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NegativeReceive = int32(8)

summary.span: 當原始訊息無法由佇列接收時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message fails to be received from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法不會移除訊息佇列，因此無法傳回此通知類型，即使您未看到此訊息。Using the method does not remove a message from the queue, so this acknowledgment type could be returned even if you did peek the message. 只有方法 (或相關非同步方法) 從佇列移除訊息。Only the method (or the related asynchronous method) removes a message from the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes None = int32(0)

summary.span: 用來要求不發佈通知訊息 (正或負) 的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request that no acknowledgment messages (positive or negative) be posted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NotAcknowledgeReachQueue = int32(4)

summary.span: 當原始訊息無法抵達佇列時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message cannot reach the queue.

summary.span: 到達佇列所需時間計時器到期或無法驗證訊息時，才會發生這種情形。

span.span: This can happen when the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if a message cannot be authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NotAcknowledgeReceive = int32(12)

summary.span: 當發生錯誤使原始訊息在接收時間計時器到期前，無法由佇列接收時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when an error occurs that prevents the original message from being received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes PositiveArrival = int32(1)

summary.span: 當原始訊息抵達佇列時用來要求正通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes PositiveReceive = int32(2)

summary.span: 當由佇列擷取原始訊息成功時用來要求正通知的遮罩。

span.span: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message is successfully retrieved from the queue.
